TextView.android:text:
1. Add a command or more of the targeted application by pressing the + button.
 2. Make sure that the command entered is valid and the program is installed in your PC.
 3. Start the server on your PC by executing the RemoteSocketServer.jar. And pressing the start server button.
 4. Change the settings of the app to match the ip address of the server(your pc) and port number = 5000.
 5. Click on the item to start it on the PC remotely!
 6. This can be used as a quick access way by launching frequently used app with one touch.
If anything goes wrong just stop the server and start it again!
